reviewText: It was probably my misunderstanding, but I thought this would show how to do the basics.  While it's a fascinating DVD, and does show a number of routines, it wasn't what I wanted.  If you just want to view some good old soft shoe, it would be perfect!

Sam Weber is such a precise teacher and beautiful dancer. His technique is impeccable and you get to see him improvise in his own style which is amazing! And it's wonderful to have the old film footage to Coles & Atkins doing their slow soft shoe. It's a collector's item as well as a perfect teaching tool. Thank you Sam.
Easy to learn, nice change of pace from other routines. Also includes Sam Weber clip doing the Coles walk around, great warm up number.

MANY THANKS RUSTY FOR YOUR GREAT INSTRUCTIONAL DVD, I LOVE YOU!!!!!!!
FROM SPAIN CHEMA MARIN. (A DANCER)
